solutionsSection.heading: Solutions & Focus Areas
solutionsSection.intro: The LionHeart portfolio of niche technology provides unique solutions across various domains to address your IT infrastructure and cybersecurity challenges.

items.name: Data Center Solutions
items.description: Software-defined data centers run workloads on-premises or in the cloud as needed. We cover servers, routers, storage, firewalls, and supporting infrastructure.

items.name: Cloud Solutions
items.description: On-demand access to shared resources that reduces costs, improves efficiency, and helps balance capex and opex.

items.name: Enterprise Data Protection
items.description: Policies, standards, and controls tailored to the sensitivity and criticality of your data across its lifecycle.

items.name: Network Security
items.description: Prevent breaches and enable operations with secure access to systems, apps, and data—without slowing the business.

items.name: Storage Solutions
items.description: Efficient storage with strong protection and governance so you can make confident, data-driven decisions.

items.name: Converged / Hyper-Converged
items.description: Integrated systems that boost efficiency and simplify ops through automated management software.

items.name: Application & Data Migration
items.description: Move from on-prem to cloud (or between clouds) with zero-downtime approaches and tight cost control.

items.name: Business Continuity & DR
items.description: Resilient backup, recovery, and continuity architectures that keep you operating during incidents.

items.name: Deployment & Maintenance
items.description: Well-deployed and well-maintained servers, storage, and networks reduce risk and downtime.

items.name: EDR / XDR / NDR
items.description: End-to-end threat detection and response with continuous monitoring and rapid remediation.

items.name: Identity Management
items.description: Comprehensive identity and access management that streamlines governance and improves security.

items.name: Threat Intelligence Management
items.description: Advanced threat detection and intelligence with integrated sources and automated correlation.

items.name: Hybrid IT Management
items.description: Unified operations across on-prem and cloud to simplify management and reduce cost.

items.name: Security Operations Centre
items.description: 24/7 monitoring and incident response to contain threats and reduce impact.

items.name: Network Operations Center
items.description: Proactive network monitoring and remediation for resilient performance.
